p: Gas chromatography/mass spectrometry (GC/MS). The GC/MS analysis was performed using a Shimadzu GC/MS QP−2010 PLUS Gas Chromatograph coupled to a mass spectrometer operating at 70 eV and an Rtx−MS column (Restek ®, Bellefonte, PA, USA) (30 m × 0.25 mm × 0.25 pm) consisting of 5%−diphenyl−95%−dimethylpolysiloxane.
